about_the_game:
This is an ancient land abandoned by the gods. The once brilliant magic civilization has long declined.Numerous magic relics and ancient civilization heritages that fall on the whole continent are still disturbing the world. Mysterious events occur one after another, wild animals behave crazily, monsters rage in the daytime, and human beings struggle to survive in this turbulent world.

People pay high prices to hire criminals, mercenaries and outlaws. They form teams to kill monsters, recapture manors, or protect caravans. Some earn commissions and become famous. Some find mysterious treasures and become rich. Most of them die under the sharp claws of monsters and become corpses.

RogueLite element: -- "Believe it or not, everyone who survived from the cave told a different story!"
Each adventure of randomly generated dungeons and caves is a unique experience. Surprises and scares are everywhere. No matter how experienced a mercenary you are, monsters can always jump out of your unexpected corners.

Single person/online CO-OP/local CO-OP: -- "Lucky for you, the strongest mercenary in this continent is willing to join you!"
Stay behind you when you open the treasure chest, share supplies when you are out of ammunition and food, fight a blood path when you are surrounded by monsters, and lend a hand when you are exhausted. The dungeon adventure with partners is a complete adventure. Whether he is on the other side of the network or on the couch next to you.

Skill combination: - "What's the use of asking teammates, just to share my reward?"
If there are no teammates, you must not know that your magic can play a greater power. As long as you have a little tacit understanding, you can stimulate each other's potential to exceed the limit, bring a little "team shock" to the monsters, and startle their rotten jaws.

Multiple occupations: - "You can't imagine I can do this!"
With the ubiquitous magic relics, many gifted people can control the incredible power. The trainer who can establish a tacit understanding with animals, the gardener who controls the growth of plants, and the alchemist who has mastered the mysterious formula. These forces beyond ordinary people will enable you to be adept in adventure, and even help your stupid teammates.
